title: 1.8.9闪退
txt_content:
这是error部分：
AL lib: (EE) MMDevApiOpenPlayback: Device init failed: 0x80004005
AL lib: (EE) MMDevApiOpenPlayback: Device init failed: 0x80004005
[15:38:37] [Thread-8/ERROR]: Error in class 'LibraryLWJGLOpenAL'
[15:38:37] [Thread-8/ERROR]: Unable to initialize OpenAL.  Probable cause: OpenAL not supported.
[15:38:45] [Client thread/ERROR]: Fatal errors were detected during the transition from INITIALIZATION to POSTINITIALIZATION. Loading cannot continue
[15:38:45] [Client thread/ERROR]: 
[15:38:45] [Client thread/ERROR]: The following problems were captured during this phase
[15:38:45] [Client thread/ERROR]: Caught exception from motionblurmod

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
3509316225 发表于 2019-12-22 15:55
电脑查看配置，集显是没的- -
有驱动的，你先试着升级，如果升级驱动后仍不可玩，那也没办法了。

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:

https://jingyan.baidu.com/article/a65957f4f028c624e77f9b5d.html

若不行，告诉我你的显卡型号
